events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect shipment.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. I'm here to help you with your refund for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached the photo of the item showing it is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method immediately and arrange a return pickup.
Thanks for the prompt response and solution. I appreciate the quick handling of the refund request.
The refund process has been completed and the return has been scheduled. Your case is now resolved.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything was satisfactory with our service.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this refund request case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your experience with our refund process.
